content.rendered:
Temporary Residential Facilities

Short-term visitation or living temporarily in the Ashram

Receptionist Hall ♦ Seekers Nivas ♦ Guru Darshan Hall
RadhaKrishna Retreat Hall ♦ Outdoor Meditation Cottages ♦ Natural Surroundings

Receptionist Area

Coming soon….

Seekers Nivas

(Visitors Temporary Facilities)
Accommodation facilities to meet the basic requirements of seekers

Matri Nivas

Purab Aur Paschin , Uttar Aur Dakshin

Suryodaya Nivas

Guru Darshan Hall

Coming soon….

RadhaKrishna Retreat Hall

Coming soon….

Outdoor Meditation Cottages

Coming soon….

Natural Surroundings

Coming soon….
